thread.title: Ben Affleck Moving In With Jennifer Garner Despite Separation
thread.title_full: Ben Affleck Moving In With Jennifer Garner Despite Separation

author: Radar Staff
title: Ben Affleck Moving In With Jennifer Garner Despite Separation
text: thisischriswhite.com thisischriswhite.com Ben Affleck is returning home to his family! Jennifer Garner is allowing her estranged husband to come home 18 months after their separation, exclusive photos obtained by RadarOnline.com can reveal. thisischriswhite.com thisischriswhite.com "This is what Jen has been praying for!" a source told Radar. "She never wanted a divorce, but felt she had no other options. Finally, Ben has sobered up enough to come home ." thisischriswhite.com thisischriswhite.com In aerial photos of their $17.55 million Pacific Palisades home, a construction crew is seen gutting the guesthouse and emptying it of everything. AKM-GSI AKM-GSI The actor moved out of their home where they were raising their children Violet, 11, Seraphina, 8, and Sam, 5. Affleck stayed at Hotel Bel-Air before crawling back to Garner. She allowed him to move into a two-bedroom guesthouse/garage on the edge of the compound. thisischriswhite.com thisischriswhite.com Despite reports that she's finally ready to file for divorce, there's new signs it's off for good. A source confirms his "man cave" is being renovated into a play area for their children . Affleck's Cadillac, two Mercedes and a vintage Chevrolet are back on their estate after he has been storing them in a Santa Monica Garage. AKM-GSI AKM-GSI thisischriswhite.com thisischriswhite.com The couple announced their decision to divorce after 10 years of marriage three months later. Reports claim Affleck's gambling, drinking and alleged affair with the family's nanny Christine Ouzounian contributed to their separation. AKM-GSI AKM-GSI They remained amicable exes during their separation, as they vacationed together as a family and celebrated events together. We pay for juicy info!
